titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: Writing letters and paying bills all the morning! In the afternoon, a walk round the Park with Lionel, & then tea & shewing the Chapel etc. to a party of Ladies including Lady Barnard â€“ there is my day!
I offered Heatherycleugh to the Revd Ernest Thompson, Assistant Curate of S. Cuthbert's, Bensham. He was ordained 13 years ago.
